name: Slender Man Rise Again (Reupload)
description:
Warning

This game is not made by me, It's was made by DVloper, It's just a reupload of the game because it's got deleted on Play Store

Description

Welcome to Slender Man Rise Again!

Your objective is to find 8 pages in 2 maps, Village and Field

But be careful, Slenderman is always following you and if you see him, try to avoid him
